I don't think Karma really fits the idea of a Marauder. She's pretty much a peace-loving monk.

They just gave Ashe a Marauder skin and Ashe is one of the good guys in the LoL lore.

Skins are generally non-canon. For example: Syndra, an evil mage, has a Justicar skin that showcase what she would look like if she embraced the side of good. Varus has a skin called Arclight that showcase what he looks like before he got corrupted.
Karma fans are waiting for the evil skin for ages already. Even Soraka has a "reaper" skin, even Syndra has a Justicar skin. Can we please enjoy our dark version of Karma? ;_;

To be fair, fans of every champion always want more skins- it's a constant black hole of need. I just think Marauder would go better for different champions since it implies a certain ferocity, a barbarism, an eagerness to fight. Karma is pretty much the poster child of enlightenment. 
Should she have an evil skin? Sure, I see no problem with that- but I feel like a Dark Sorcerer or something would be much more thematically appropriate than Marauder.

I'll personally wish for a Cyber Karma skin till the day I die, similar to Pulsefire Ezreal. Her Mantra provides the perfect opportunity for making commands with a computer voice. Her little back shield could be turned into a rotating holographic, and her abilities could be made to look computer generated. 
Alas, no drawing talent to translate my idea to an image others can see.
